doc.field: Series VIII: The Cultural Space / The Laboratory
Series VIII: The Cultural Space / The Laboratory

Series VIII: The Cultural Space / The Laboratory preserves records of the organization founded by artist Papo Colo in 1990. This series consists of two subseries that separate exhibition and administrative files. Subseries A: Exhibition Files includes artists' resumes, photographic components, and promotional materials; these materials are arranged chronologically by show opening date. Subseries B: Administrative Files preserves correspondence and financial records that are arranged alphabetically by record type.
